meanings.definition: Relating to or involving different cultures.
meanings.sent1: The transcultural festival showcased traditions from around the world.
meanings.sent2: Her transcultural upbringing gave her a unique perspective on global issues.
meanings.sent3: The transcultural potluck was a delicious mix of flavors and customs.
meanings.sent4: His music was a transcultural blend of jazz and traditional folk melodies.
meanings.sent5: The transcultural art exhibit beautifully depicted diversity and unity.

meanings.definition: Extending across or bridging different cultures.
meanings.sent1: The transcultural exchange program promoted understanding between students from diverse backgrounds.
meanings.sent2: The company's transcultural policies encouraged collaboration among employees from various countries.
meanings.sent3: The transcultural fashion show featured outfits that combined elements from multiple traditions.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was a transcultural bridge connecting people from different parts of the world.
meanings.sent5: The transcultural dance performance symbolized harmony among nations through movement.
